verses.roman:
bāhire yāñā ānilena dui nārikela
dekhiyā apūrva haila vismita sakala

synonyms: bāhire—outside; yāñā—going; ānilena—He immediately brought; dui—two; nārikela—coconuts; dekhiyā—seeing; apūrva—this wonder; haila—became; vismita—astonished; sakala—all.
translation: He then immediately went outside the house and brought two coconuts. All the ladies were astonished to see such wonderful activities.
